reduceOptions.fields: /^\{__name__="gio_domains", app_kubernetes_io_component="gateway", app_kubernetes_io_instance="am\-4\-2\-perf", app_kubernetes_io_name="am", app_kubernetes_io_version="am\-1221\-latest", application="gio\-am\-gateway", cloud_provider="Azure", cluster="performance\-test", exported_instance="am\-4\-2\-perf\-gateway\-577fb9c47c\-nvvl5", instance="10\.0\.0\.167:18092", job="kubernetes\-pods", kubernetes_namespace="am\-4\-2\-perf", kubernetes_pod_name="am\-4\-2\-perf\-gateway\-577fb9c47c\-nvvl5", pod_template_hash="577fb9c47c", prometheus="monitoring/prometheus\-kube\-prometheus\-prometheus", prometheus_replica="prometheus\-prometheus\-kube\-prometheus\-prometheus\-0", purpose="monitoring"\}$/

targets.expr: sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (abs(delta(gio_auth_evt_total{auth_status="SUCCESS", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus", idp="internal"}[$__interval])))

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (abs(delta(gio_auth_evt_total{auth_status="FAILURE", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus", idp="internal"}[$__interval])))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, pool) (mongodb_driver_pool_size{pool="common-pool", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, pool) (mongodb_driver_pool_size{pool="idp-mongo", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, pool) (mongodb_driver_pool_checkedout{pool="common-pool", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, pool) (mongodb_driver_pool_checkedout{pool="idp-mongo", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, pool) (mongodb_driver_pool_waitqueuesize{pool="common-pool", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, pool) (mongodb_driver_pool_waitqueuesize{pool="idp-mongo", application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(http_server_requests_total{application="gio-am-gateway", local="0.0.0.0:8092", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(http_server_response_time_seconds_sum{application="gio-am-gateway", local="0.0.0.0:8092", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(http_server_response_time_seconds_count{application="gio-am-gateway", local="0.0.0.0:8092", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"}[$__rate_interval]) * 1000)

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="gio-am-gateway", area="heap", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

sum by(id, kubernetes_pod_name) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="gio-am-gateway", cluster="$cluster", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", prometheus!="monitoring/prometheus-kube-prometheus-prometheus"})

list.description: K6 will maybe push data at different intervals that the scrap one, meaning it would be hard to use the default $__rate_interval.
list.name: k6_rate_interval
